function.signature: JMVC.head.addscript(String src, Boolean parse, Boolean explicit)
function.description: Add a script in the head section

params.param: this can be the url of the script or the script content (you can even use \{\{myscript name=`hello` ... \{\} )
set true if You mean to use JMVC.vars variables placeholders in the script
set true if You mean to pass the script content or a view placeholder in the src (even with on-the-fly variables), in that case 'parse' argument will be considered as true in any case
